note.p: Career: Contributed to John Evelyn's (FRS 1663) 'Pomona'; made wines from various types of fruit
Other RSActivity: Acted as correspondent to the Society, in particular with Henry Oldenburg, on topics such as the fertilisation of orchards and gardening.
Expelled due to non-payment of arrears.
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; Hunter; Oldenburg, VI, p. 225-6, XII, p. 232-3; Bysshe (see References)
References: Bysshe, Sir Edward 'Visitation of Dorset, 1677; ed GD Squibb' (London: Harleian Society, 1977) (Harleian Society, 117)
Notes: See Birch vol 4, p 421 and Correspondence of Oldenburg VI for more details.
